education.summary: Working under the supervision of Prof. Charu Sharma. Research focused on 3D computer vision, generative models, and anomaly detection.
Graduated with distinction. Final year project on point cloud completion using deep learning.

work.name: Machine Learning Lab (MLL), IIIT Hyderabad
work.summary: Worked on knowledge distillation techniques in computer vision.
highlights: Analyzed and evaluated various knowledge distillation techniques.
Authored a paper proposing a novel knowledge distillation framework for Point Cloud data.

work.name: RadicalX
work.summary: Worked on building a dashboard for managing hiring programs.
highlights: Enabled companies to hire contractors and manage programs via a secure dashboard.

work.name: Advanced Geometric Computing Lab (AGCL), IIT Madras
work.summary: Worked on CAD sketch classification and reconstruction.
highlights: Developed methods for classification and reconstruction of 2D CAD models.
